ygData.subject: Re: Lord Nagafens Demise
ygData.msgSnippet: ... like ... Are you kidding me.  I ve been part of this list for over two months.  Did you suddenly decide to bring this up this time because all I said were
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
>
> Is this a bard list or a MLM list? Please, don't post any more garbage
like
> this or I will petition to have you removed from the list.
>

Are you kidding me. I've been part of this list for over two months. Did
you suddenly decide to bring this up this time because all I said were three
words. How is that any different from the person that said "Great story"?
So what if my signature file has a few lines of advertising. I've been
posting here all this time to hear about and contribute to the bard class in
Everquest. I though the story about the take down of Lord Nagafen was very
cool. I would love to be a part of that someday. If someone comes in here
spamming the mailing list with advertising, great ban them I'm all for that.
But that's not even close to what I have done.

Mark
